targets.query: SELECT mean("corrected") FROM "downstream_statistics" WHERE ("channel_id" =~ /^$downstream_channel$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "channel_id" fill(null)

SELECT last("corrected") AS "corrected", last("frequency") AS "frequency", last("power") AS "power", last("snr") AS "snr", last("uncorrectables") AS "uncorrectables" FROM "downstream_statistics" WHERE ("channel_id" =~ /^$downstream_channel$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "channel_id" fill(none)
SELECT mean("uncorrectables") FROM "downstream_statistics" WHERE ("channel_id" =~ /^$downstream_channel$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("uncorrectables") FROM "downstream_statistics" WHERE ("channel_id" =~ /^$downstream_channel$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("uncorrectables") FROM "downstream_statistics" WHERE ("channel_id" =~ /^$downstream_channel$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("uncorrectables") FROM "downstream_statistics" WHERE ("channel_id" =~ /^$downstream_channel$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

list.definition: select DISTINCT("channel_id") from (select power, channel_id from downstream_statistics WHERE $timeFilter)
list.name: downstream_channel
list.query: select DISTINCT("channel_id") from (select power, channel_id from downstream_statistics WHERE $timeFilter)
